name: 2048 Celebrity
description:
This application is a puzzle which is based on the 2048 game.

User has to swipe to move the tiles. Whenever two tiles have same character, they merge into a more character. When 2048 character tile is created, user will win.

 Features:  - Swipes work for grid area  - User can replay game  - User can see current score and best score  - User can see point table for puzzle
Category of game mode:

 1-Bollywood Actor 
2-Bollywood Actress 
3-Hollywood Actor 
4-Hollywood Actress 
5-Politician
 6-Hollywood Singer
